Demo for click DOM event in mi MathML element

Click in x or y for input a value to replace it:

x x + x x + y + x x + y + x + x x + y + x + y + x

Click in ⅈ will not ask for a value:

ⅈ

Click in π for input a value to replace it:

π

Click in ⅇ will not ask for a value:

ⅇ
